Unregister.zh-tw: 未註冊的子例程總是返回“ 0”。

UnTransform.en: This function is used to allow a module instance to draw in the default window coordinates even if the instance is contained within a transform. This statement may only appear in a script.
UnTransform.zh-cn: 此功能用于允许模块实例在默认窗口坐标中绘制，即使该实例包含在转换中。此语句可能只出现在脚本中。
UnTransform.zh-tw: 此功能用於允許模塊實例在默認窗口坐標中繪製，即使該實例包含在轉換中。此語句可能只出現在腳本中。

UpdateCoordinates.en: It should be noted that after this graphic statement is recompiled that any new instances of that statement will have the new coordinate information stored in them.
UpdateCoordinates.zh-cn: 应当指出的是，在重新编译此图形语句后，该语句的任何新实例都将在其中存储新的坐标信息。
UpdateCoordinates.zh-tw: 應當指出的是，在重新編譯此圖形語句後，該語句的任何新實例都將在其中存儲新的坐標信息。

UserCredChange.en: Initially returns zero For VIC sessions, this additionally increments its return value at twice the rate specified by the SessionTokenTimeout configuration setting. This is used by internal system components to refresh a VICâs security session token.
UserCredChange.zh-cn: 最初将VIC会话返回零，此外，这将以SessionTokentImeout配置设置指定的速率增加其返回值。内部系统组件用于刷新VIC的安全性会话令牌。
UserCredChange.zh-tw: 最初將VIC會話返回零，此外，這將以SessionTokentImeout配置設置指定的速率增加其返回值。內部系統組件用於刷新VIC的安全性會話令牌。

Valid.en: This function always returns a valid value.
Valid.zh-cn: 此功能始终返回有效的值。
Valid.zh-tw: 此功能始終返回有效的值。

ValidateEmailAddrs.en: Multiple addresses are assumed to be separated by semi-colons in the input string. This subroutine returns TRUE if the email addresses in the string are syntactically valid, otherwise, FALSE is returned. ValidateEmailAddrs checks that each address has an @ symbol that is not the first or last character, and that each address has a dot appearing at least 2 characters after the @ symbol, with no dot appearing immediately after the @ sign, and no dot as last character.
ValidateEmailAddrs.zh-cn: 假定多个地址通过输入字符串中的半彩色分开。如果字符串中的电子邮件地址在语法上有效，则该子例程将返回True，否则将返回false。 ValidateMailAddrs检查每个地址是否具有一个不是第一个或最后一个字符的 @符号，并且每个地址在 @符号之后至少出现2个字符，而 @符号之后没有dot出现， @ sign之后没有dot，也没有dot作为最后一个字符。
ValidateEmailAddrs.zh-tw: 假定多個地址通過輸入字符串中的半彩色分開。如果字符串中的電子郵件地址在語法上有效，則該子例程將返回True，否則將返回false。 ValidateMailAddrs檢查每個地址是否具有一個不是第一個或最後一個字符的 @符號，並且每個地址在 @符號之後至少出現2個字符，而 @符號之後沒有dot出現， @ sign之後沒有dot，也沒有dot作為最後一個字符。

ValueType.en: This returns the type of the value passed in the parameter
ValueType.zh-cn: 这返回参数中传递的值的类型
ValueType.zh-tw: 這返回參數中傳遞的值的類型

Variable.en: This function can be used on the left side of an assignment, in which case the value will be assigned to the variable named in the Name parameter. This function can be used for debugging, or to create sophisticated data logging and monitoring packages which access any variable by its typed-in name. Note that the string containing the name may not contain leading or trailing spaces, or square brackets [ ]. This function is the same as the '\' operator, when the '\' operator is before a single operand. (\Member). This function is able to resolve variables that have the PROTECTED attribute. LocalVariable A related function, LocalVariable() exists, but will be used rarely. No documentation is provided beyond the following note: LocalVariable(Name) is the same as Scope(Self, Name, TRUE). This expression is useful only in the case that there is a value containing the name of a variable, which is added after the module is compiled and is referenced within the local module. LocalVariable is the same as the '.' operator. .Member (i.e. without an object before the dot) compiles to LocalVariable("Member"), which is the equivalent of Variable("Member", TRUE).
Variable.zh-cn: 该功能可以在分配的左侧使用，在这种情况下，该值将分配给名称参数中命名的变量。此功能可用于调试，或创建复杂的数据记录和监视软件包，以通过其键入名称访问任何变量。请注意，包含名称的字符串可能不包含前导或落后空间或方括号[]。当“ \”运算符在单个操作数之前，此函数与“ \”运算符相同。 （\成员）。此功能能够解析具有受保护属性的变量。 LocalVaria可以存在一个相关功能，存在LocalVariable（），但很少使用。除了以下注：localvariable（名称）与范围（self，name，true）相同。仅在包含变量名称的值的情况下，此表达式才有用，该值在编译模块并在本地模块中引用后添加。 Localvaria可以与“”。操作员。 。
Variable.zh-tw: 該功能可以在分配的左側使用，在這種情況下，該值將分配給名稱參數中命名的變量。此功能可用於調試，或創建複雜的數據記錄和監視軟件包，以通過其鍵入名稱訪問任何變量。請注意，包含名稱的字符串可能不包含前導或落後空間或方括號[]。當“ \”運算符在單個操作數之前，此函數與“ \”運算符相同。 （\成員）。此功能能夠解析具有受保護屬性的變量。 LocalVaria可以存在一個相關功能，存在LocalVariable（），但很少使用。除了以下注：localvariable（名稱）與範圍（self，name，true）相同。僅在包含變量名稱的值的情況下，此表達式才有用，該值在編譯模塊並在本地模塊中引用後添加。 Localvaria可以與“”。操作員。 。

VariableClass.en: This function may only appear in a script.
VariableClass.zh-cn: 此函数可能仅出现在脚本中。
VariableClass.zh-tw: 此函數可能僅出現在腳本中。

Variance.en: The invalid parameters are not skipped over, but they are not included in the calculation. The function returns an invalid result if either of its parameters is invalid or if there are less than two valid numerical array elements in the specified range. This function does calculations with double-precision floating point values and does not support 64-bit integers computations.
Variance.zh-cn: 无效的参数并未跳过，但未包含在计算中。该函数将返回无效的结果，如果其两个参数无效，或者指定范围内的两个有效数值元素元素少于两个有效的数值元素。此函数可以通过双精度浮点值进行计算，并且不支持64位整数计算。
Variance.zh-tw: 無效的參數並未跳過，但未包含在計算中。該函數將返回無效的結果，如果其兩個參數無效，或者指定範圍內的兩個有效數值元素元素少於兩個有效的數值元素。此函數可以通過雙精度浮點值進行計算，並且不支持64位整數計算。

Version.en: This function can be used to perform various tasks based on the version number of VTScada.
Version.zh-cn: 此功能可用于基于VTSCADA的版本编号执行各种任务。
Version.zh-tw: 此功能可用於基於VTSCADA的版本編號執行各種任務。

VersionRequired.en: This function returns the minimum version of VTScada required to execute any and all modules (.RUN files) loaded since the last call to this function, or if no other call was made, since startup. After the call is made to this function, it will reset the version to invalid until another module is loaded.
VersionRequired.zh-cn: 此功能返回以自从启动以来的最后一个调用，或者没有其他呼叫（启动）以来，返回执行加载的任何和所有模块（.lun文件）所需的VTSCADA的最低版本。对此功能进行调用后，它将重置为无效的版本，直到加载另一个模块为止。
VersionRequired.zh-tw: 此功能返回以自從啟動以來的最後一個調用，或者沒有其他呼叫（啟動）以來，返回執行加載的任何和所有模塊（.lun文件）所需的VTSCADA的最低版本。對此功能進行調用後，它將重置為無效的版本，直到加載另一個模塊為止。

Vertex.en: A vertex describes a group of up to three point values. The first sets the location. The following two are used when drawing curves and should be set invalid otherwise. Vertex values are grouped to form paths. For each vertex, the center point defines a point on the path. Each line segment or Bezier curve along the path is defined by two vertices, one at each end. The vertices' center point is the end point of the Bezier curve. The OutHandlePoint of one vertex and the InHandlePoint of the other vertex define the Bezier curve shape points. So, each Bezier curve is defined by 4 points: the two end points, and two 'handle' points. Vertex values are also used in the graphics functions GUIArc, GUIChord, and GUIPie to determine the start and end angles for those graphics functions. The angle from the center point to the InHandlePoint defines the starting angle. The angle from the center point to the OutHandlePoint defines the ending angle
Vertex.zh-cn: 一个顶点描述了一组最多三个点值。第一个设置位置。绘制曲线时使用以下两个，否则应将其设置为无效。顶点值分组以形成路径。对于每个顶点，中心点定义了路径上的一个点。沿路径的每个线段或偏斜曲线都由两个顶点定义，每个顶点在两端。顶点的中心点是Bezier曲线的终点。一个顶点的外界点和另一个顶点的无义点定义了bezier曲线形状点。因此，每个Bezier曲线都定义为4分：两个端点和两个“句柄”点。顶点值也用于图形函数Guiarc，Guichord和Guipie，以确定这些图形功能的开始角度和端角。从中心点到InHandlePoint的角度定义了起始角。从中心点到唯一点的角度定义了终点
Vertex.zh-tw: 一個頂點描述了一組最多三個點值。第一個設置位置。繪製曲線時使用以下兩個，否則應將其設置為無效。頂點值分組以形成路徑。對於每個頂點，中心點定義了路徑上的一個點。沿路徑的每個線段或偏斜曲線都由兩個頂點定義，每個頂點在兩端。頂點的中心點是Bezier曲線的終點。一個頂點的外界點和另一個頂點的無義點定義了bezier曲線形狀點。因此，每個Bezier曲線都定義為4分：兩個端點和兩個“句柄”點。頂點值也用於圖形函數Guiarc，Guichord和Guipie，以確定這些圖形功能的開始角度和端角。從中心點到InHandlePoint的角度定義了起始角。從中心點到唯一點的角度定義了終點

VICInfo.en: The return value of VICInfo is an array of information. Each row [leftmost subscript] contains the information for one session, and each column within the row contains the fields of session information, as follows: [n][0] Object value of the root (BrowserClient) module instance for this session. [n][1] VIC process session ID [a 16-byte binary GUID]. This is guaranteed to be unique per VIC process. i.e. two sessions from the same VIC process will have the same VIC instance ID. [n][2] IP of the remote computer, from the server's point of view [note this may be the IP of a gateway or proxy that the remote computer connects via]. [n][3] Total bytes transmitted to the VIC in this session. [n][4] Total bytes received from the VIC in this session. [n][5] Approximate round trip time to the VIC, in milliseconds. [n][6] Uncompressed bytes transmitted to the VIC. [n][7] Session identifier for the connection to the server.
VICInfo.zh-cn: Vicinfo的返回值是一系列信息。每行[最左下标]包含一个会话的信息，并且该行中的每列包含会话信息的字段，如下所示：[n] [0] root（browserClient）模块实例的对象值。 [n] [1] VIC过程会话ID [A 16字节二进制GUID]。这是根据VIC过程唯一的。即，来自同一VIC过程的两个会话将具有相同的VIC实例ID。 [n] [2]远程计算机的IP，从服务器的角度来看[注意这可能是远程计算机通过的网关或代理的IP]。 [n] [3]在本届会议中传输到VIC的总字节。 [n] [4]在本届会议中从VIC接收的总字节。 [n] [5]以毫秒为单位，将往返VIC的往返时间。 [n] [6]未压缩的字节传输到VIC。 [n] [7]与服务器连接的会话标识符。
VICInfo.zh-tw: Vicinfo的返回值是一系列信息。每行[最左下標]包含一個會話的信息，並且該行中的每列包含會話信息的字段，如下所示：[n] [0] root（browserClient）模塊實例的對象值。 [n] [1] VIC過程會話ID [A 16字節二進制GUID]。這是根據VIC過程唯一的。即，來自同一VIC過程的兩個會話將具有相同的VIC實例ID。 [n] [2]遠程計算機的IP，從服務器的角度來看[注意這可能是遠程計算機通過的網關或代理的IP]。 [n] [3]在本屆會議中傳輸到VIC的總字節。 [n] [4]在本屆會議中從VIC接收的總字節。 [n] [5]以毫秒為單位，將往返VIC的往返時間。 [n] [6]未壓縮的字節傳輸到VIC。 [n] [7]與服務器連接的會話標識符。

VICMessage.en: There is no return value for this statement. The Object value is typically retrieved from the return value of a VICInfo statement.
VICMessage.zh-cn: 此语句没有回报值。该对象值通常是从Vicinfo语句的返回值中检索的。
VICMessage.zh-tw: 此語句沒有回報值。該對象值通常是從Vicinfo語句的返回值中檢索的。

VICSmartcardMonitor.en: This is a reset-able function whose initial return value is FALSE.  The function will be triggered by  a message from the VIC indicating either an attempt to sign in using a smart card or a removal of the smart card  and then the return value is TRUE.
VICSmartcardMonitor.zh-cn: 这是一个可重置的函数，其初始返回值为false。  该功能将由VIC的消息触发，该消息指示尝试使用智能卡登录或删除智能卡，然后返回值为真。
VICSmartcardMonitor.zh-tw: 這是一個可重置的函數，其初始返回值為false。  該功能將由VIC的消息觸發，該消息指示嘗試使用智能卡登錄或刪除智能卡，然後返回值為真。

VoiceTalk.en: This function returns the error code resulting from issuing the command to the speech engine, or zero if no error was encountered. This function is not threaded, however, it creates a thread inside of which the handle referring to the text-to-speech stream is accessed. All other speech functions on this stream do not create their own thread, but will execute in the thread created by this function. This thread will exist for as long as the VoiceTalk statement remains active (i.e. until a state change occurs). For this reason, the state containing the VoiceTalk call must remain active until all other speech statements have finished executing. There can be multiple SAPI text-to-speech streams open at any time.
VoiceTalk.zh-cn: 此功能返回由将命令发给语音引擎产生的错误代码，如果遇到错误，则零。但是，此功能没有螺纹，但是，它创建了一个线程，其中访问了访问文本到语音流的句柄。此流上的所有其他语音功能都不创建自己的线程，而是在此功能创建的线程中执行。只要Voicetalk语句保持活跃（即直到发生状态变化发生），则该线程将存在。因此，包含语音呼叫的状态必须保持活跃，直到所有其他语音语句都完成为止。可以随时打开多个SAPI文本到语音流。
VoiceTalk.zh-tw: 此功能返回由將命令發給語音引擎產生的錯誤代碼，如果遇到錯誤，則零。但是，此功能沒有螺紋，但是，它創建了一個線程，其中訪問了訪問文本到語音流的句柄。此流上的所有其他語音功能都不創建自己的線程，而是在此功能創建的線程中執行。只要Voicetalk語句保持活躍（即直到發生狀態變化發生），則該線程將存在。因此，包含語音呼叫的狀態必須保持活躍，直到所有其他語音語句都完成為止。可以隨時打開多個SAPI文本到語音流。

VScrollbar.en: This module is a member of the System Library, and must therefore be prefaced by \System. as shown in the "Format" section. If your application predates version 11.2, use the backslash notation rather than dot: \System\ Steps can be calculated by subtracting the number of visible items from the total number of scrollable items. PageLen is equal to the number of visible items. Items can be thought of as rows, where a row will have a height of N pixels. As an example, consider an Alarm Page that is showing 50 alarms, where only 20 of them are visible. The operator needs to click the down arrow on the scrollbar 30 times to reach the bottom of the alarm list, so Steps would be set to 30. If the operator clicks on the scrollbar area other than the  tab, they expect to see it scroll by a "page", which in this example is 20 rows. PageLen would therefore be set to 20. In some situations you may want the down arrow to move more than one row at a time, say 3 rows, so you would set StepSize to 3. Note that there is no need to provide the width of the row in pixels to VScrollbar. Custom script graphics using the VScrollbar module directly need to pass in a window object to serve as source for the mouse wheel messages. Typically this would be the window that the VScrollbar module is controlling. Note that the VScrollbar module itself uses a native windows scrollbar, which will therefore work automaticallywithout any script changes, so long as the mouse pointer is over the actual scrollbar.
VScrollbar.zh-cn: 该模块是系统库的成员，因此必须由\ System进行。如“格式”部分所示。如果您的应用程序早于版本11.2，请使用BackSlash符号而不是点：\ System \步骤可以通过从可滚动项总数中减去可见项目数来计算。 Pagelen等于可见项目的数量。可以将项目视为行，其中一行的高度为n像素。例如，考虑一个显示50个警报的警报页面，其中只有20个可见。操作员需要单击30次滚动栏上的向下箭头才能到达警报列表的底部，因此将步骤设置为30。如果操作员在选项卡以外的滚动栏区域上单击其他，他们希望在此示例中看到它的“页面”，该示例为20行。因此，Pagelen将设置为20。在某些情况下，您可能希望向下箭头一次移动多个行，例如3行，因此您将步骤设置为3行。请注意，无需在像素中以像素为vscrollbar的行中的行宽度。使用VSCrollbar模块的自定义脚本图形直接需要传递在窗口对像中，以充当鼠标车轮消息的来源。通常，这是VSCrollbar模块控制的窗口。请注意，VSCrollbar模块本身使用本机Windows Scrollbar，因此，只要鼠标指针与实际的Scrolllbar相比，它将自动起作用而无需任何脚本更改。
VScrollbar.zh-tw: 該模塊是系統庫的成員，因此必須由\ System進行。如“格式”部分所示。如果您的應用程序早於版本11.2，請使用BackSlash符號而不是點：\ System \步驟可以通過從可滾動項總數中減去可見項目數來計算。 Pagelen等於可見項目的數量。可以將項目視為行，其中一行的高度為n像素。例如，考慮一個顯示50個警報的警報頁面，其中只有20個可見。操作員需要單擊30次滾動欄上的向下箭頭才能到達警報列表的底部，因此將步驟設置為30。如果操作員在選項卡以外的滾動欄區域上單擊其他，他們希望在此示例中看到它的“頁面”，該示例為20行。因此，Pagelen將設置為20。在某些情況下，您可能希望向下箭頭一次移動多個行，例如3行，因此您將步驟設置為3行。請注意，無需在像素中以像素為vscrollbar的行中的行寬度。使用VSCrollbar模塊的自定義腳本圖形直接需要傳遞在窗口對像中，以充當鼠標車輪消息的來源。通常，這是VSCrollbar模塊控制的窗口。請注意，VSCrollbar模塊本身使用本機Windows Scrollbar，因此，只要鼠標指針與實際的Scrolllbar相比，它將自動起作用而無需任何腳本更改。

Watch.en: This is a reset-able function whose initial return value will be set by the first parameter. This parameter is ignored after the initial evaluation of the function. The Watch function will not be triggered by a variable whose value has been set to its existing value. That is to say, if a variable has a value of 3 and it is set in the code again to a value of 3, then there is no change and this function will not be triggered. Only the first parameter (Start) is mandatory. Use Watch(1) to trigger a script once only on the first entry to a state. A change in type (from 5 to "5") will also trigger the Watch. In accordance with the VTScada Coding Standards, do not use Watch(0, ...). Either use Watch(1, ...) or capture the values of the watched values before entering the state and check if they have changed. Watch(0, ...) has the potential to miss a change that occurs after starting a state but before Watch(0, ...) runs.
Watch.zh-cn: 这是一个可重置的函数，其初始返回值将由第一个参数设置。在对功能进行初始评估后，该参数将被忽略。手表功能不会由已将值设置为现有值的变量触发。也就是说，如果变量的值为3，并且在代码中再次将其设置为3，则没有更改，并且不会触发此函数。只有第一个参数（启动）是强制性的。使用手表（1）仅在第一个条目到状态的第一个条目时触发一次脚本。类型的变化（从5到“ 5”）也会触发手表。根据VTSCADA编码标准，请勿使用手表（0，...）。在输入状态之前，请使用手表（1，...）或捕获手表值的值并检查它们是否已更改。观看（0，...）有可能错过启动状态后但在观看之前（0，...）运行之前发生的更改。
Watch.zh-tw: 這是一個可重置的函數，其初始返回值將由第一個參數設置。在對功能進行初始評估後，該參數將被忽略。手錶功能不會由已將值設置為現有值的變量觸發。也就是說，如果變量的值為3，並且在代碼中再次將其設置為3，則沒有更改，並且不會觸發此函數。只有第一個參數（啟動）是強制性的。使用手錶（1）僅在第一個條目到狀態的第一個條目時觸發一次腳本。類型的變化（從5到“ 5”）也會觸發手錶。根據VTSCADA編碼標準，請勿使用手錶（0，...）。在輸入狀態之前，請使用手錶（1，...）或捕獲手錶值的值並檢查它們是否已更改。觀看（0，...）有可能錯過啟動狀態後但在觀看之前（0，...）運行之前發生的更改。

WatchArray.en: This is a resettable function whose initial return value will be set by the first parameter. This parameter is ignored after the initial evaluation of the function.
WatchArray.zh-cn: 这是一个可重复的函数，其初始返回值将由第一个参数设置。在对功能进行初始评估后，该参数将被忽略。
WatchArray.zh-tw: 這是一個可重複的函數，其初始返回值將由第一個參數設置。在對功能進行初始評估後，該參數將被忽略。

WatchTags.en: WatchTags() will trigger immediately, much like a Watch(1).
WatchTags.zh-cn: watchtags（）将立即触发，就像手表（1）一样。
WatchTags.zh-tw: watchtags（）將立即觸發，就像手錶（1）一樣。

WCSubscribe.en: This function is commonly used in conjunction with ReadConfiguration(). The callback() will be notified when a particular file has changed and will trigger another module to call ReadConfiguration() to read the changes from that file. "ChangedFiles" contains absolute file paths.
WCSubscribe.zh-cn: 此函数通常与ReadConfiguration（）结合使用。当特定文件已更改时，将通知CALLBACK（），并将触发另一个模块来调用ReadConfiguration（）以读取该文件的更改。 “更改文件”包含绝对文件路径。
WCSubscribe.zh-tw: 此函數通常與ReadConfiguration（）結合使用。當特定文件已更改時，將通知CALLBACK（），並將觸發另一個模塊來調用ReadConfiguration（）以讀取該文件的更改。 “更改文件”包含絕對文件路徑。

WebBrowser.en: This is used by the Web Browser widget. To use this tool on either a thick client (workstation) or the VIC, the workstation requires the optional WebView2 component, which is built on the Edge browser from Microsoft. (The Anywhere Client does not require WebView2 to be installed.) If WebView2 is not installed, it can be obtained by running the VTScada or VIC installer and selecting the option to install WebView2. Alternatively it can be downloaded from Microsoft , via the Evergreen Bootstrapper Installer or via the Evergreen Standalone Installer for machines with restricted access to the Internet.
WebBrowser.zh-cn: Web浏览器小部件使用了这一点。要在厚的客户端（工作站）或VIC上使用此工具，工作站需要可选的WebView2组件，该组件是在Microsoft的边缘浏览器上构建的。 （Anywhere Client不需要安装WebView2。）如果未安装WebView2，则可以通过运行VTSCADA或VIC安装程序并选择安装WebView2的选项来获得。另外，它可以通过Microsoft，Evergreen Bootstrapper安装程序或通过限制访问Internet的机器下载。
WebBrowser.zh-tw: Web瀏覽器小部件使用了這一點。要在厚的客戶端（工作站）或VIC上使用此工具，工作站需要可選的WebView2組件，該組件是在Microsoft的邊緣瀏覽器上構建的。 （Anywhere Client不需要安裝WebView2。）如果未安裝WebView2，則可以通過運行VTSCADA或VIC安裝程序並選擇安裝WebView2的選項來獲得。另外，它可以通過Microsoft，Evergreen Bootstrapper安裝程序或通過限制訪問Internet的機器下載。

WebBrowserNavigate.en: Returns TRUE if the browser is running and FALSE otherwise.
WebBrowserNavigate.zh-cn: 如果浏览器正在运行，则返回true，否则为false。
WebBrowserNavigate.zh-tw: 如果瀏覽器正在運行，則返回true，否則為false。

WebSktSubscribe.en: The account being used to authenticate the WebSocket request needs to have "Thin Client Access" privilege. Once registered, HTTPServer will call the NewRequest and NewWebSocket subroutines in the CallbackScope object every time a new request to create a WebSocket is received. Templates for NewRequest and NewWebSocket follow.
WebSktSubscribe.zh-cn: 用于身份验证Websocke请求的帐户需要具有“薄客户端访问”特权。注册后，HTTPSERVER每次收到新的请求以创建WebSocket的新请求时，都会在CallbackScope对像中调用NewRequest和NewWebsocket子例程。 newrequest和newwebsocket的模板接下来。
WebSktSubscribe.zh-tw: 用於身份驗證Websocke請求的帳戶需要具有“薄客戶端訪問”特權。註冊後，HTTPSERVER每次收到新的請求以創建WebSocket的新請求時，都會在CallbackScope對像中調用NewRequest和NewWebsocket子例程。 newrequest和newwebsocket的模板接下來。

WhileLoop.en: No other statement will execute as long as Condition is true. Care must be taken that the statement terminates since it has the potential of locking up the system if it does not exit.
WhileLoop.zh-cn: 只要条件为真，就不会执行其他声明。必须注意该陈述终止，因为如果该声明不退出，该声明有可能锁定系统。
WhileLoop.zh-tw: 只要條件為真，就不會執行其他聲明。必須注意該陳述終止，因為如果該聲明不退出，該聲明有可能鎖定係統。

WinComboCtrl.en:
The return value for WinComboCtrl can be one of the following values: Invalid- Nothing happened or there is a problem with the control. 0Internal buffer changed 1Selection made from list or Enter key pressed 2Focus has been lost. Data must be a one-dimensional array of text values. Index is a variable that receives the current selection array index, or the text value if the droplist has an editable selection and new text is entered that does not match any item in the array. If FocusID is Invalid or less than or equal to "0", the current selection cannot be modified. VTScada's native WinCtrls do not behave the same way that they do in other programming languages.
These events are only registered in conjunction with an internal buffer change. ie. a <CR> press or a focus lost is only registered after a change in the data parameter (internal buffer)
WinComboCtrl.zh-cn:
WinComBoctrl的返回值可以是以下值之一：无效 - 没有发生或对控件有问题。 0内部缓冲区更改了1个从列表或Enter键按2焦点进行的选择。数据必须是文本值的一维数组。索引是一个可接收当前选择数组索引的变量，如果Droplist具有可编辑的选择，并且输入了与数组中的任何项目不匹配的新文本，则索引值。如果FocusID无效或小于或等于“ 0”，则无法修改当前选择。 VTSCADA的本地Winctrl的行为与其他编程语言的行为方式相同。
这些事件仅与内部缓冲区更改一起注册。 IE。仅在更改数据参数（内部缓冲区）之后才会注册A <cr>或丢失的焦点
WinComboCtrl.zh-tw:
WinComBoctrl的返回值可以是以下值之一：無效 - 沒有發生或對控件有問題。 0內部緩衝區更改了1個從列表或Enter鍵按2焦點進行的選擇。數據必須是文本值的一維數組。索引是一個可接收當前選擇數組索引的變量，如果Droplist具有可編輯的選擇，並且輸入了與數組中的任何項目不匹配的新文本，則索引值。如果FocusID無效或小於或等於“ 0”，則無法修改當前選擇。 VTSCADA的本地Winctrl的行為與其他編程語言的行為方式相同。
這些事件僅與內部緩衝區更改一起註冊。 IE。僅在更改數據參數（內部緩衝區）之後才會註冊A <cr>或丟失的焦點

Window.en:
This function returns the value returned by Module. When a window is maximized, its maximized size is not based on the size of the screen, although for many commercial applications the two are the same, but rather, its full size is defined by the fifth and sixth parameters, namely virtual width and height. If the view area and the virtual area of the window have been defined to be the same, selecting the maximize button will appear to have no effect. The minimum size of a window is based on the operating system under which the application is running, as well as the attributes of the window itself as defined by the Style parameter. The width need only be greater than or equal to 0. Window heights similarly need only be greater than or equal to 0. GUITransform functions may make use of VStatus to inquire about the boundaries of the window they are within. A window can be turned into a drag and drop target by adding the callback modules, OLEDrag and OLEDrop. Further details can be found in the chapter, Create Windows & Use Graphics Functions. If a ribbon is to be associated with this window, then the ribbon must be instantiated at the same time that the window is created, using the two optional parameters, RibbonName and RibbonState. Ribbons are compiled into resources, using Microsoft Visual Studio. The resources can then be linked directly into VTS.EXE (Trihedral use only) or into an external DLL. This allows multiple ribbons to be provided in separate DLLs. You can have more than one ribbon in VTS.EXE or a DLL. RibbonName is of the form "dllname|ribbonname", being the name of the DLL, a vertical pipe symbol and the name of the ribbon resource within the DLL. If the ribbon is compiled into VTS, the dllname and the pipe separator character are omitted. If adding a ribbon to a window, and if there is a chance that the window will be maximized, you should use the window's virtual width and virtual height as follows: Window(0, 0, 1024, 768,
       VStatus(Self(), 26), VStatus(Self(), 27) + VSTatus(Self(), 23), ... The virtual height in particular is important as otherwise there will be a gap at the bottom of the window (normally, eight pixels) that is the size of the frame height.
Window.zh-cn:
此功能返回模块返回的值。当窗口最大化时，其最大尺寸并不基于屏幕的大小，尽管对于许多商业应用，两者是相同的，而是它的完整大小由第五和第六参数定义，即虚拟宽度和高度。如果将视图区域和窗口的虚拟区域定义为相同，则选择最大化按钮似乎没有效果。窗口的最小尺寸基于该应用程序正在运行的操作系统以及样式参数定义的窗口本身的属性。宽度只需大于或等于0。窗口高度类似地只需大于或等于0。吉特式函数可能会使用vstatus来查询它们在其中的窗口的边界。通过添加回调模块，Oledrag和Oledrop，可以将窗口变成拖放目标。可以在本章中找到更多详细信息，创建Windows并使用图形功能。如果要与此窗口关联功能区，则必须使用两个可选参数，功能区名称和功能板在创建窗口的同时实例化功能区。使用Microsoft Visual Studio将丝带汇编成资源。然后可以将资源直接链接到vts.exe（仅使用三面体使用），也可以将其链接到外部DLL中。这允许在单独的DLL中提供多个丝带。您可以在vts.exe或dll中具有多个功能区。功能区名称为“ dllname | ribbonname”的形式，是dll的名称，垂直管道符号和DLL中的功能区资源的名称。如果将色带汇编成VT，则省略了dllname和管道分离器字符。如果将功能区添加到窗口，并且如果窗口有可能最大化，则应使用窗口的虚拟宽度和虚拟高度，如下所示：窗口（0，0，0，1024，768，
       vStatus（self（），26），vstatus（self（self（），27） + vstatus（self（），23），...尤其是虚拟高度很重要，否则窗口的底部（通常是八个像素）是框架高度的大小。
Window.zh-tw:
此功能返回模塊返回的值。當窗口最大化時，其最大尺寸並不基於屏幕的大小，儘管對於許多商業應用，兩者是相同的，而是它的完整大小由第五和第六參數定義，即虛擬寬度和高度。如果將視圖區域和窗口的虛擬區域定義為相同，則選擇最大化按鈕似乎沒有效果。窗口的最小尺寸基於該應用程序正在運行的操作系統以及樣式參數定義的窗口本身的屬性。寬度只需大於或等於0。窗口高度類似地只需大於或等於0。吉特式函數可能會使用vstatus來查詢它們在其中的窗口的邊界。通過添加回調模塊，Oledrag和Oledrop，可以將窗口變成拖放目標。可以在本章中找到更多詳細信息，創建Windows並使用圖形功能。如果要與此窗口關聯功能區，則必須使用兩個可選參數，功能區名稱和功能板在創建窗口的同時實例化功能區。使用Microsoft Visual Studio將絲帶彙編成資源。然後可以將資源直接鏈接到vts.exe（僅使用三面體使用），也可以將其鏈接到外部DLL中。這允許在單獨的DLL中提供多個絲帶。您可以在vts.exe或dll中具有多個功能區。功能區名稱為“ dllname | ribbonname”的形式，是dll的名稱，垂直管道符號和DLL中的功能區資源的名稱。如果將色帶彙編成VT，則省略了dllname和管道分離器字符。如果將功能區添加到窗口，並且如果窗口有可能最大化，則應使用窗口的虛擬寬度和虛擬高度，如下所示：窗口（0，0，0，1024，768，
       vStatus（self（），26），vstatus（self（self（），27） + vstatus（self（），23），...尤其是虛擬高度很重要，否則窗口的底部（通常是八個像素）是框架高度的大小。

WindowClose.en: Only one WindowClose() should run with a window at a given time. WindowClose() can be used inside a window that you opened with a Window() call. For any page or widget, or other window do not use WindowClose because you cannot know if WindowClose is already being used with that window (as is likely the case). If this function is active when an attempt to close a window is made, the window will not close, and the module(s) in that window will not stop. It is up to the calling module to close the window and stop the module(s) by switching to another state. This function may be used to control what happens when a window is closed (or to prevent it from being closed). When the attempt is made to close the window, an action (or actions) can be triggered. For example, this might write some data to file. Then a variable could be set (or a value could be returned by the module) which signals the calling module to switch states, which closes the window and stops the module(s) inside. Notes on closing a window: When WindowClose behavior is active, the typical way to close a window is by making one of the following happen: The Enable parameter to the Window() function changes to false. The state where the Window() function is running in steady state stops. This is typically achieved by doing one of two things: The calling object's state changes away from the state containing the Window() function. The calling object is slain. Calling Slay on the root object of the window does not work. (For example, calling Slay(Self) from the window's root object.) The root object of the window is called in steady-state, from the Window function's 7th parameter. Slaying an object that has been called in steady-state does nothing because it does not affect the calling object: the calling object would still be in it's same state with that same Window() call running, and therefore the called Window module cannot be permitted to stop. If the calling object is launched, then a common approach is to slay that calling object. For example, Slay(Caller(Self)) rather than Slay(Self) may work, depending on how the object was launched.
WindowClose.zh-cn: 在给定时间，只有一个WindowClose（）应带有窗口。 WindowClose（）可以在您使用窗口（）调用打开的窗口中使用。对于任何页面或小部件或其他窗口，请勿使用WindowClose，因为您不知道该窗口是否已经在使用WindowClose（可能是这种情况）。如果尝试关闭窗口时，此功能是活动的，则将无法关闭窗口，并且该窗口中的模块不会停止。通过切换到另一个状态来关闭窗口并停止模块。此功能可用于控制关闭窗口时发生的情况（或防止其关闭）。尝试关闭窗口时，可以触发一个操作（或动作）。例如，这可能会将一些数据写入文件。然后可以设置一个变量（或模块可以返回的值），该变量向调用模块发出信号，该模块关闭窗口并在内部停止模块。关闭窗口的注释：当窗口电视行为处于活动状态时，关闭窗口的典型方法是使以下一个发生：启用参数到window（）函数将变为false。窗口（）函数以稳态停止运行的状态。这通常是通过做两件事之一来实现的：调用对象的状态从包含窗口（）函数的状态变化。调用对像被杀死。在窗口的根对像上呼叫杀人不起作用。 （例如，从窗口的根对象调用slay（self）。）窗口的根对像在steptectate中，从窗口函数的第7个参数中调用。杀死一个在稳态中调用的对象无能为力，因为它不会影响调用对象：调用对象仍然处于同一状态，而同一窗口（）调用正在运行，因此不能允许将调用的窗口模块停止。如果启动了调用对象，那么一种常见的方法是杀死该调用对象。例如，根据对象的启动方式，杀死（呼叫者（self））而不是杀死（self）可以起作用。
WindowClose.zh-tw: 在給定時間，只有一個WindowClose（）應帶有窗口。 WindowClose（）可以在您使用窗口（）調用打開的窗口中使用。對於任何頁面或小部件或其他窗口，請勿使用WindowClose，因為您不知道該窗口是否已經在使用WindowClose（可能是這種情況）。如果嘗試關閉窗口時，此功能是活動的，則將無法關閉窗口，並且該窗口中的模塊不會停止。通過切換到另一個狀態來關閉窗口並停止模塊。此功能可用於控制關閉窗口時發生的情況（或防止其關閉）。嘗試關閉窗口時，可以觸發一個操作（或動作）。例如，這可能會將一些數據寫入文件。然後可以設置一個變量（或模塊可以返回的值），該變量向調用模塊發出信號，該模塊關閉窗口並在內部停止模塊。關閉窗口的註釋：當窗口電視行為處於活動狀態時，關閉窗口的典型方法是使以下一個發生：啟用參數到window（）函數將變為false。窗口（）函數以穩態停止運行的狀態。這通常是通過做兩件事之一來實現的：調用對象的狀態從包含窗口（）函數的狀態變化。調用對像被殺死。在窗口的根對像上呼叫殺人不起作用。 （例如，從窗口的根對象調用slay（self）。）窗口的根對像在steptectate中，從窗口函數的第7個參數中調用。殺死一個在穩態中調用的對象無能為力，因為它不會影響調用對象：調用對象仍然處於同一狀態，而同一窗口（）調用正在運行，因此不能允許將調用的窗口模塊停止。如果啟動了調用對象，那麼一種常見的方法是殺死該調用對象。例如，根據對象的啟動方式，殺死（呼叫者（self））而不是殺死（self）可以起作用。

WindowOptions.en: This statement will alter the attributes of the window as it is running. The values that the given options can be set to are from -32763 to 32763. When the option value is set to 15, the function requires four parameters, all of which must be valid. The last two set the minimum width and height
WindowOptions.zh-cn: 此语句将在运行时更改窗口的属性。可以设置给定选项的值均来自-32763至32763。当选项值设置为15时，该函数需要四个参数，所有参数必须有效。最后两个设定最小宽度和高度
WindowOptions.zh-tw: 此語句將在運行時更改窗口的屬性。可以設置給定選項的值均來自-32763至32763。當選項值設置為15時，該函數需要四個參數，所有參數必須有效。最後兩個設定最小寬度和高度

WindowsLogon.en: This function should not be used for VTScada-based authentication. Note that this function may take some time to complete and will block the caller until it does. Other threads in the VTScada system will continue to run while this function is executing.
WindowsLogon.zh-cn: 此功能不应用于基于VTSCADA的身份验证。请注意，此功能可能需要一些时间才能完成，并且会阻止呼叫者直到完成为止。在执行此功能时，VTSCADA系统中的其他线程将继续运行。
WindowsLogon.zh-tw: 此功能不應用於基於VTSCADA的身份驗證。請注意，此功能可能需要一些時間才能完成，並且會阻止呼叫者直到完成為止。在執行此功能時，VTSCADA系統中的其他線程將繼續運行。

WindowSnapshot.en: Available mime types include image/bmp, image/jpeg, image/gif, image/tiff, image/png. Note: Runs asynchronously from a VTScada Internet Client. In this case, the return value is meaningless. Within an Anywhere Client session, this function does nothing.
WindowSnapshot.zh-cn: 可用的MIME类型包括图像/BMP，图像/JPEG，Image/gif，Image/Tiff，Image/PNG。注意：从VTSCADA Internet客户端进行异步运行。在这种情况下，返回值毫无意义。在任何位置客户端会话中，此功能无能为力。
WindowSnapshot.zh-tw: 可用的MIME類型包括圖像/BMP，圖像/JPEG，Image/gif，Image/Tiff，Image/PNG。注意：從VTSCADA Internet客戶端進行異步運行。在這種情況下，返回值毫無意義。在任何位置客戶端會話中，此功能無能為力。

WinLocWheel.en: The function looks for mouse movements while the cursor is within the bounds of the object window. The modifier key values come from the Win32 definitions of MK_SHIFTKEY(4) and MK_CTRLKEY(8). When the mouse is over the window and the modifier key is held down, one mouse wheel "roll-click" will cause ScrollChange to be set to -1 or 1, depending on the direction of the roll. On a very busy system, it is possible for multiple wheel rolls to be captured in one trigger of the statement, so ScrollChange may be any integral number but usually each roll-click results in a single trigger with ScrollChange set to -1 or 1.
WinLocWheel.zh-cn: 当光标位于对象窗口的边界内时，该功能寻找鼠标运动。修饰符键值来自mk_shiftkey（4）和mk_ctrlkey（8）的Win32定义。当鼠标在窗口上方并按住修饰符钥匙时，一个鼠标车轮“滚动点击”会导致将滚动调解设置为-1或1，具体取决于滚动的方向。在一个非常繁忙的系统上，可以在语句的一个触发器中捕获多个轮卷，因此滚动汇总可能是任何积分的数字，但通常每个滚动键单击会导致单个触发器将ScrollChange设置为-1或1。
WinLocWheel.zh-tw: 當光標位於對象窗口的邊界內時，該功能尋找鼠標運動。修飾符鍵值來自mk_shiftkey（4）和mk_ctrlkey（8）的Win32定義。當鼠標在窗口上方並按住修飾符鑰匙時，一個鼠標車輪“滾動點擊”會導致將滾動調解設置為-1或1，具體取決於滾動的方向。在一個非常繁忙的系統上，可以在語句的一個觸發器中捕獲多個輪卷，因此滾動匯總可能是任何積分的數字，但通常每個滾動鍵單擊會導致單個觸發器將ScrollChange設置為-1或1。

WinTooltipCtrl.en: This statement returns Invalid. The background color, text color, and delay timings are set on a per-window basis using the WindowOptions statement.
WinTooltipCtrl.zh-cn: 该语句返回无效。背景颜色，文本颜色和延迟定时是使用WindowOptions语句以每次窗口设置的。
WinTooltipCtrl.zh-tw: 該語句返回無效。背景顏色，文本顏色和延遲定時是使用WindowOptions語句以每次窗口設置的。

WinXLoc.en: Returns the location of the mouse for a particular window. If the mouse is not over that window, it retains the value from the last time that the mouse was over that window. If the window that the mouse is over is a child window, a WinXLoc/WinYLoc statement in the parent will register the same values as one in the child. That is, the coordinate position in the child window. Similarly, when the mouse is moved over the parent, the values for WinXLoc/WinYLoc in both the parent and child windows will be the same. That is, the location of the mouse in the parent window. Note: This function is disabled when using a GUITransform as a GUIStrectch.
WinXLoc.zh-cn: 返回特定窗口的鼠标位置。如果鼠标不在该窗口上，它将保留鼠标上一次窗口上的值。如果鼠标结束的窗口是一个子窗口，则父母中的WinxLoc/Winyloc语句将注册与孩子中相同的值。也就是说，在子窗口中的坐标位置。同样，当鼠标移动到父母上时，在父母和子女窗口中，winxloc/winyloc的值都相同。也就是说，鼠标在父窗口中的位置。注意：当使用吉特式作为Guistrectch时，该功能将被禁用。
WinXLoc.zh-tw: 返回特定窗口的鼠標位置。如果鼠標不在該窗口上，它將保留鼠標上一次窗口上的值。如果鼠標結束的窗口是一個子窗口，則父母中的WinxLoc/Winyloc語句將註冊與孩子中相同的值。也就是說，在子窗口中的坐標位置。同樣，當鼠標移動到父母上時，在父母和子女窗口中，winxloc/winyloc的值都相同。也就是說，鼠標在父窗口中的位置。注意：當使用吉特式作為Guistrectch時，該功能將被禁用。

WKSList.en: Returns an array of sub-paths that are a refinement of the query path returned from WKSPath. If the query path provided is a broad category, the resulting array may be quite large. Returns a Windowsâ¢ PDH error code upon failure. This is a long integer containing a 32-bit code.
WKSList.zh-cn: 返回一系列子路径，这是从WKSPath返回的查询路径的改进。如果提供的查询路径是广泛的类别，则结果数组可能很大。失败后返回Windows¢PDH错误代码。这是一个包含32位代码的长整数。
WKSList.zh-tw: 返回一系列子路徑，這是從WKSPath返回的查詢路徑的改進。如果提供的查詢路徑是廣泛的類別，則結果數組可能很大。失敗後返回Windows¢PDH錯誤代碼。這是一個包含32位代碼的長整數。

WKSPath.en: If the optional parameters are to be included but not specifically set, then wildcard values must be provided. For text parameters, use the asterisk *, and for numeric parameters, use -1. The output from WKSPath will usually be passed to WKSList for further processing, then to WKSStatus to use to query workstation status. The parameters to this function and the resulting query path are best understood in the context of the Windowsâ¢ Performance Monitor. Returns a Windowsâ¢ PDH error code upon failure. This is a long integer containing a 32-bit code.
WKSPath.zh-cn: 如果要包含可选参数，但不是专门设置的，则必须提供通配符值。对于文本参数，请使用星号 *，对于数字参数，请使用-1。 WKSPath的输出通常会传递给WKSLIST以进行进一步处理，然后将其用于WKSTATUS以查询工作站状态。在Windows性能监视器的上下文中，最好理解此功能的参数和结果查询路径。失败后返回Windows¢PDH错误代码。这是一个包含32位代码的长整数。
WKSPath.zh-tw: 如果要包含可選參數，但不是專門設置的，則必須提供通配符值。對於文本參數，請使用星號 *，對於數字參數，請使用-1。 WKSPath的輸出通常會傳遞給WKSLIST以進行進一步處理，然後將其用於WKSTATUS以查詢工作站狀態。在Windows性能監視器的上下文中，最好理解此功能的參數和結果查詢路徑。失敗後返回Windows¢PDH錯誤代碼。這是一個包含32位代碼的長整數。

WKSStatus.en: Returns a number of type double as a result of the query provided. Upon error, the result will be invalid. The operation type can be set to 1 to obtain the error code. Note that some queries must be checked multiple times before a result will be produced, therefore not all error codes are critical. The WksStatus function can report values greater than 100% for percentage counters such as "\\@\Process(VTS)\% Processor Time" when (for example) a total of more than one CPU core is being used by the process.
WKSStatus.zh-cn: 由于提供的查询，返回了许多类型的双重键。错误后，结果将无效。操作类型可以设置为1以获取错误代码。请注意，必须在产生结果之前多次检查某些查询，因此并非所有错误代码都是至关重要的。对于百分比计数器，例如“ \\@\ process（vts）\％处理器时间”（例如，该过程总共使用一个以上的CPU核心时），WKSSTATUS函数可以报告大于100％的值。
WKSStatus.zh-tw: 由於提供的查詢，返回了許多類型的雙重鍵。錯誤後，結果將無效。操作類型可以設置為1以獲取錯誤代碼。請注意，必須在產生結果之前多次檢查某些查詢，因此並非所有錯誤代碼都是至關重要的。對於百分比計數器，例如“ \\@\ process（vts）\％處理器時間”（例如，該過程總共使用一個以上的CPU核心時），WKSSTATUS函數可以報告大於100％的值。

WKStaInfo.en: If looking for the workstation name, it is more efficient to use the \RPCManager variable WkStnName rather than call this function. (\RPCManager.WkStnName) Variables available in \RPCManager This function will only return a valid value if the machine has a workstation name assigned to it (i.e. if network services have been installed). If network services have not been installed it will return invalid. Option 3, the unique machine identifier, returns a 6-byte binary buffer. Use the function System.BuffToHex on the returned value if you would like to use the MachineID as a Hex string. VTScada relies on a Windows function call to obtain the NetBios name of workstations. That function will truncate names that are longer than 15 characters. You are advised to limit workstation names to be 15 characters or less.
WKStaInfo.zh-cn: 如果寻找工作站名称，则使用\ rpcManager变量WKSTNNAME而不是调用此功能更有效。 （\ rpcmanager.wkstnname）\ rpcmanager中可用的变量此函数仅在计算机分配给工作站名称（即是否已安装网络服务）时才能返回有效值。如果尚未安装网络服务，它将返回无效。选项3（唯一的机器标识符）返回6字节二进制缓冲区。如果您想将机器ID用作十六进制字符串，请在返回值上使用函数system.bufftohex。 VTSCADA依靠Windows功能调用来获取工作站的NetBios名称。该函数将截断超过15个字符的名称。建议您将工作站名称限制为15个字符或更少。
WKStaInfo.zh-tw: 如果尋找工作站名稱，則使用\ rpcManager變量WKSTNNAME而不是調用此功能更有效。 （\ rpcmanager.wkstnname）\ rpcmanager中可用的變量此函數僅在計算機分配給工作站名稱（即是否已安裝網絡服務）時才能返回有效值。如果尚未安裝網絡服務，它將返回無效。選項3（唯一的機器標識符）返回6字節二進制緩衝區。如果您想將機器ID用作十六進製字符串，請在返回值上使用函數system.bufftohex。 VTSCADA依靠Windows功能調用來獲取工作站的NetBios名稱。該函數將截斷超過15個字符的名稱。建議您將工作站名稱限制為15個字符或更少。

WrapText.en: Pixels are assumed to have a dpi size of 96.

Write.en: Allows the writing of a specific address on demand. The resulting data will be sent only to the requesting machine. Write returns Invalid when called on the client. Only when running on the server does it return an object that can be used to tell if the write is done. The object value of the underlying read module is returned from the function. When the write finishes, the returned objectâs value will go to Invalid, signaling the end of the write operation.
Write.zh-cn: 允许按需撰写特定地址。结果数据将仅发送到请求计算机。在客户端打电话时，写入返回无效。只有在服务器上运行时，它才会返回一个可以用来判断写入是否完成的对象。基础读取模块的对象值从函数返回。当写入完成时，返回的对象的值将变为无效，表明写操作的末尾。
Write.zh-tw: 允許按需撰寫特定地址。結果數據將僅發送到請求計算機。在客戶端打電話時，寫入返回無效。只有在服務器上運行時，它才會返回一個可以用來判斷寫入是否完成的對象。基礎讀取模塊的對象值從函數返回。當寫入完成時，返回的對象的值將變為無效，表明寫操作的末尾。

WriteHistory.en: In order to ensure that the history is successfully written, this function must be called with the same data on all Historian-potential servers, (which can be done by calling it on all workstations,) unless BroadcastMode is TRUE, in which case it need only be called on exactly one workstation (any workstation). Possible return values are as follows: -1 if the number of timestamps passed in does not match the number of data entries passed in. 0 otherwise. This does not indicate that the data was written, just that the above condition on the parameters held true.
WriteHistory.zh-cn: 为了确保成功编写历史记录，必须在所有历史学家电位服务器上使用相同的数据来调用此功能（可以通过在所有工作站上调用它来完成），除非广播模式为真，在这种情况下，只需要在一个工作站（任何工作站）上调用它。可能的返回值如下：-1，如果传递的时间戳数量与传递的数据条目的数量不匹配。 0否则。这并不表明数据是编写的，只是对参数的上述条件真实。
WriteHistory.zh-tw: 為了確保成功編寫歷史記錄，必須在所有歷史學家電位服務器上使用相同的數據來調用此功能（可以通過在所有工作站上調用它來完成），除非廣播模式為真，在這種情況下，只需要在一個工作站（任何工作站）上調用它。可能的返回值如下：-1，如果傳遞的時間戳數量與傳遞的數據條目的數量不匹配。 0否則。這並不表明數據是編寫的，只是對參數的上述條件真實。

WriteINI.en: For developers the lock means that access to VTScada working copy files, both reading and writing, should not be done without having the lock. The lock is across all applications and system layer VTScada code. The lock prevents two different piece of code from changing the same code such that one piece of code sees inconsistent data while the other code is in the middle of changing it. This module is a member of the System Library, and must therefore be prefaced by \System. as shown in the "Format" section. If your application predates version 11.2, use the backslash notation rather than dot: \System\ The subroutine returns true (1) if the write was successful and invalid otherwise. If the Settings file, the section, or the variable does not exist, they will be created. Searches performed by this function are case insensitive. Alignment of equal signs in the file is preserved.
WriteINI.zh-cn: 对于开发人员而言，锁定意味着访问VTSCADA工作复制文件（读写和写作）不应在没有锁定的情况下完成。该锁定在所有应用程序和系统层VTSCADA代码中。该锁可以防止两个不同的代码更改相同的代码，从而使一个代码看到不一致的数据，而另一个代码则在更改它的中间。该模块是系统库的成员，因此必须由\ System进行。如“格式”部分所示。如果您的应用程序早于版本11.2，请使用Backslash符号而不是点：\ System \ SubRoutine返回True（1）如果写入成功，否则无效。如果不存在设置文件，部分或变量，则将创建它们。该功能执行的搜索是不敏感的。保留文件中均等符号的对齐。
WriteINI.zh-tw: 對於開發人員而言，鎖定意味著訪問VTSCADA工作複製文件（讀寫和寫作）不應在沒有鎖定的情況下完成。該鎖定在所有應用程序和系統層VTSCADA代碼中。該鎖可以防止兩個不同的代碼更改相同的代碼，從而使一個代碼看到不一致的數據，而另一個代碼則在更改它的中間。該模塊是系統庫的成員，因此必須由\ System進行。如“格式”部分所示。如果您的應用程序早於版本11.2，請使用Backslash符號而不是點：\ System \ SubRoutine返回True（1）如果寫入成功，否則無效。如果不存在設置文件，部分或變量，則將創建它們。該功能執行的搜索是不敏感的。保留文件中均等符號的對齊。

WriteINIProperties.en: This function is the opposite of ReadINIProperties. In nearly all cases, it is recommended that WritePropertiesFile be used in place of this function.
WriteINIProperties.zh-cn: 此功能是读取的对立面。在几乎所有情况下，建议使用WritePropertiesFile代替此功能。
WriteINIProperties.zh-tw: 此功能是讀取的對立面。在幾乎所有情況下，建議使用WritePropertiesFile代替此功能。

WriteLock.en: This subroutine is a member of the RPC Manager's Library, and must therefore be prefaced by \RPCManager\, as shown in the "Format" section. If the application you are developing is a script application, the subroutine call must be prefaced by System\RPCManager\, and the System variable must be declared in AppRoot.SRC.
WriteLock.zh-cn: 该子例程是RPC Manager库的成员，因此必须由\ rpcmanager \ the，如“格式”部分所示。如果您正在开发的应用程序是脚本应用程序，则子例程呼叫必须由System \ rpcManager \置于脚本应用程序，并且必须在Argyot.src中声明系统变量。
WriteLock.zh-tw: 該子例程是RPC Manager庫的成員，因此必須由\ rpcmanager \ the，如“格式”部分所示。如果您正在開發的應用程序是腳本應用程序，則子例程呼叫必須由System \ rpcManager \置於腳本應用程序，並且必須在Argyot.src中聲明系統變量。

WriteSectINI.en: WriteSectINI is a subroutine, and as such it needs to return quickly. It therefore cannot wait for a lock. For developers the lock means that access to VTScada working copy files, both reading and writing, should not be done without having the lock. The lock is across all applications and system layer VTScada code. The lock prevents two different piece of code from changing the same code such that one piece of code sees inconsistent data while the other code is in the middle of changing it. This module is a member of the System Library, and must therefore be prefaced by \System. as shown in the "Format" section. If your application predates version 11.2, use the backslash notation rather than dot: \System\ The subroutine returns true (1) if the write was successful and invalid otherwise. If the Settings file or the section does not exist, they will be created. If the VarList parameter is invalid, a blank section will be created. This is a destructive write. That is to say, the entire section of the file is overwritten by the new section, regardless of the contents of either. Searches performed by this function are case insensitive. Alignment of equal signs in the file is preserved.
WriteSectINI.zh-cn: Writesectini是一个子例程，因此需要快速返回。因此，它无法等待锁。对于开发人员而言，锁定意味着访问VTSCADA工作复制文件（读写和写作）不应在没有锁定的情况下完成。该锁定在所有应用程序和系统层VTSCADA代码中。该锁可以防止两个不同的代码更改相同的代码，从而使一个代码看到不一致的数据，而另一个代码则在更改它的中间。该模块是系统库的成员，因此必须由\ System进行。如“格式”部分所示。如果您的应用程序早于版本11.2，请使用Backslash符号而不是点：\ System \ SubRoutine返回True（1）如果写入成功，否则无效。如果设置文件或部分不存在，则将创建它们。如果Varlist参数无效，将创建一个空白部分。这是一篇破坏性的写作。也就是说，文件的整个部分都被新部分覆盖，而不管两个内容的内容如何。该功能执行的搜索是不敏感的。保留文件中均等符号的对齐。
WriteSectINI.zh-tw: Writesectini是一個子例程，因此需要快速返回。因此，它無法等待鎖。對於開發人員而言，鎖定意味著訪問VTSCADA工作複製文件（讀寫和寫作）不應在沒有鎖定的情況下完成。該鎖定在所有應用程序和系統層VTSCADA代碼中。該鎖可以防止兩個不同的代碼更改相同的代碼，從而使一個代碼看到不一致的數據，而另一個代碼則在更改它的中間。該模塊是系統庫的成員，因此必須由\ System進行。如“格式”部分所示。如果您的應用程序早於版本11.2，請使用Backslash符號而不是點：\ System \ SubRoutine返回True（1）如果寫入成功，否則無效。如果設置文件或部分不存在，則將創建它們。如果Varlist參數無效，將創建一個空白部分。這是一篇破壞性的寫作。也就是說，文件的整個部分都被新部分覆蓋，而不管兩個內容的內容如何。該功能執行的搜索是不敏感的。保留文件中均等符號的對齊。

XMLAddSchema.en: Each schema will be validated for standards conformance before being added to the cache. Returns 0 if it succeeds, otherwise it returns a numeric specifying a Windows error code and sets the variable named in the optional ErrorMessageOut parameter to a text error message. If the schema load succeeds, the types identified by the schema are added to the factory.
XMLAddSchema.zh-cn: 在添加到缓存之前，将对标准符合度进行验证。返回0如果成功，否则将返回一个指定Windows错误代码的数字，并将可选的ErrorMessageOut参数中命名的变量设置为文本错误消息。如果架构负载成功，则架构标识的类型将添加到工厂中。
XMLAddSchema.zh-tw: 在添加到緩存之前，將對標準符合度進行驗證。返回0如果成功，否則將返回一個指定Windows錯誤代碼的數字，並將可選的ErrorMessageOut參數中命名的變量設置為文本錯誤消息。如果架構負載成功，則架構標識的類型將添加到工廠中。

XMLCloneNode.en: If the optional member dictionary parameter is supplied, any additional members will be added to the cloned node in the same order that they were added to the dictionary.
XMLCloneNode.zh-cn: 如果提供了可选成员字典参数，则将以与词典相同的顺序添加任何其他成员。
XMLCloneNode.zh-tw: 如果提供了可選成員字典參數，則將以與詞典相同的順序添加任何其他成員。

XMLCreateNode.en: If the optional member dictionary parameter is supplied, any additional members will be added to the XMLNode in the same order that they were added to the dictionary. If the #comment or #cdata members require values, they can be assigned after the node has been created.
XMLCreateNode.zh-cn: 如果提供了可选的成员字典参数，则将以与词典相同的顺序添加任何其他成员。如果#comment或#cdata成员需要值，则可以在创建节点后分配它们。
XMLCreateNode.zh-tw: 如果提供了可選的成員字典參數，則將以與詞典相同的順序添加任何其他成員。如果#comment或#cdata成員需要值，則可以在創建節點後分配它們。

XMLDeleteMember.en: The deletion of the member is done "in-place".
XMLDeleteMember.zh-cn: 会员的删除已“就地”完成。
XMLDeleteMember.zh-tw: 會員的刪除已“就地”完成。

XMLGetNode.en:
When isolating a particular XMLNode, to pass to a subroutine for instance, the automatic subscripting of an XMLNode to provide the value in its #content member means that this is passed to the subroutine. Thus, GoodXML = Valid(XMLGetNode(XMLData)); Is not equivalent to XMLObject = XMLGetNode(XMLData);
   GoodXML  = Valid(XMLObject); To defeat the automatic subscripting, use this function. See notes in VTScada Engine XML API for a discussion of how to address arrays within an XML node.
XMLGetNode.zh-cn:
当隔离特定的XMLNODE时，要传递到子例程，例如，XMLNode的自动订阅以在其#Content成员中提供值，这意味着将其传递给子例程。因此，goodxml =有效（xmlgetNode（xmldata））;不等于xmlobject = xmlgetNode（xmldata）;
   goodxml =有效（xmlobject）;要打败自动订阅，请使用此功能。有关如何解决XML节点中的数组的讨论，请参见VTSCADA Engine XML API中的注释。
XMLGetNode.zh-tw:
當隔離特定的XMLNODE時，要傳遞到子例程，例如，XMLNode的自動訂閱以在其#Content成員中提供值，這意味著將其傳遞給子例程。因此，goodxml =有效（xmlgetNode（xmldata））;不等於xmlobject = xmlgetNode（xmldata）;
   goodxml =有效（xmlobject）;要打敗自動訂閱，請使用此功能。有關如何解決XML節點中的數組的討論，請參見VTSCADA Engine XML API中的註釋。

XMLParse.en: The XML may be either a stream or a text value. Returns 0 if it succeeds. Otherwise returns a numeric specifying a Windows error code and sets the variable named in the optional ErrorMessageOut parameter to a text error message. Passing a very large text value to the function will result in an error. To avoid this, convert the text value to a stream using BuffStream(). In versions of VTS prior to release 10, it is necessary to explicitly slay the XMLNodeTree (the XMLNodeTreeOut parameter to XMLParse) when you are finished with it The output parameter, XMLNodeTreeOut, will receive a valid XMLNode tree from a validating processor even if validation fails, so long as the XML can be parsed. A valid "XMLNodeTreeOut" with a valid "ErrorMessageOut" indicates a parse-able message that fails validation. A helper function, GetXMLNodeArray, can be used on the result to extract an array of XMLnodes matching a given type name.
XMLParse.zh-cn: XML可以是流或文本值。如果成功返回0。否则，将返回一个指定Windows错误代码的数字，并将可选的ErrorMessageOut参数中命名的变量设置为文本错误消息。将非常大的文本值传递给该函数将导致错误。为了避免这种情况，请使用Buffstream（）将文本值转换为流。在版本10之前的VT版本中，有必要明确杀死XMlNodetree（XmlNodetreeout参数到XMLPARSE）时，您将其完成后，输出参数，xmlnodetreeout，xmlnodetreeout，即使验证的验证者也可以从xmmlnode上接收有效的xmlNode树，即使验证也可以失败，因此可以将其置于xmm的情况下。有效的“ XMLNODETREEOUT”，具有有效的“ errormessageout”，指示可解析的消息失败验证。可以在结果上使用助手功能GetXMlNodeArray来提取与给定类型名称匹配的XMLNODE的数组。
XMLParse.zh-tw: XML可以是流或文本值。如果成功返回0。否則，將返回一個指定Windows錯誤代碼的數字，並將可選的ErrorMessageOut參數中命名的變量設置為文本錯誤消息。將非常大的文本值傳遞給該函數將導致錯誤。為了避免這種情況，請使用Buffstream（）將文本值轉換為流。在版本10之前的VT版本中，有必要明確殺死XMlNodetree（XmlNodetreeout參數到XMLPARSE）時，您將其完成後，輸出參數，xmlnodetreeout，xmlnodetreeout，即使驗證的驗證者也可以從xmmlnode上接收有效的xmlNode樹，即使驗證也可以失敗，因此可以將其置於xmm的情況下。有效的“ XMLNODETREEOUT”，具有有效的“ errormessageout”，指示可解析的消息失敗驗證。可以在結果上使用助手功能GetXMlNodeArray來提取與給定類型名稱匹配的XMLNODE的數組。

XMLProcessor.en: If SchemaCacheDictionary is a valid variable, the XML Processor will be a validating processor, otherwise it will be a non-validating processor. To destroy an XML Processor, invalidate the last reference to it.
XMLProcessor.zh-cn: 如果schemachedictionary是有效的变量，则XML处理器将是一个验证处理器，否则它将是非验证处理器。要销毁XML处理器，请对其进行最后的引用。
XMLProcessor.zh-tw: 如果schemachedictionary是有效的變量，則XML處理器將是一個驗證處理器，否則它將是非驗證處理器。要銷毀XML處理器，請對其進行最後的引用。

XMLWrite.en: The XML is in the form of a stream and is inserted to the stream passed in XMLOut, starting at its current position. If XMLOut does not contain a stream, a new BufferStream is created and returned in XMLOut. Returns 0 if it succeeds. Otherwise returns a numeric specifying a Windows error code and sets the variable named in the optional ErrorMessageOut parameter to a text error message. If XSLTString is not a valid XSLT transform, the XML out will not be transformed, but ErrorMessageOut and the return value will be set to indicate the transform failure.
XMLWrite.zh-cn: XML是流的形式，并插入到XMLOUT中的流中，从其当前位置开始。如果XMLOUT不包含流，则在XMLOUT中创建并返回了新的BufferStream。如果成功返回0。否则，将返回一个指定Windows错误代码的数字，并将可选的ErrorMessageOut参数中命名的变量设置为文本错误消息。如果XSLTSTRING不是有效的XSLT变换，则不会转换XML，而是ErrorMessageOut，并且将设置返回值以指示转换故障。
XMLWrite.zh-tw: XML是流的形式，並插入到XMLOUT中的流中，從其當前位置開始。如果XMLOUT不包含流，則在XMLOUT中創建並返回了新的BufferStream。如果成功返回0。否則，將返回一個指定Windows錯誤代碼的數字，並將可選的ErrorMessageOut參數中命名的變量設置為文本錯誤消息。如果XSLTSTRING不是有效的XSLT變換，則不會轉換XML，而是ErrorMessageOut，並且將設置返回值以指示轉換故障。

XOr.en: This function compares the corresponding bits of two values. The result bit is 1 if exactly one of the two bits is 1. The result bit is 0 if both bits are the same (either both 1 or both 0). This function takes signed 64-bit integers values. If a number is passed outside the range of a signed 64-bit integer, then the function will return invalid. If Value is invalid, the return value is invalid. (See: Bitwise Parameters & Operations )
XOr.zh-cn: 此函数比较两个值的相应位。结果位是1，如果两个位之一是1中的一个。如果两个位相同（1或两个0），则结果位为0。此功能采用符号符号的64位整数值。如果一个数字被超出签名的64位整数的范围，则该函数将返回无效。如果值无效，则返回值无效。 （请参阅：位参数和操作）
XOr.zh-tw: 此函數比較兩個值的相應位。結果位是1，如果兩個位之一是1中的一個。如果兩個位相同（1或兩個0），則結果位為0。此功能採用符號符號的64位整數值。如果一個數字被超出簽名的64位整數的範圍，則該函數將返回無效。如果值無效，則返回值無效。 （請參閱：位參數和操作）

Year.en: This function works in conjunction with the Day and Month functions to decompose a date number into the corresponding day, month and year.
Year.zh-cn: 该功能与日常和月份功能一起使用，将日期编号分解为相应的日期，月和年。
Year.zh-tw: 該功能與日常和月份功能一起使用，將日期編號分解為相應的日期，月和年。

ZBar.en: Although this is a layered graphic, it cannot be edited using the Idea Studio. It is for use within text mode editing only.
ZBar.zh-cn: 尽管这是一个分层的图形，但不能使用Idea Studio进行编辑。它仅在文本模式编辑中使用。
ZBar.zh-tw: 儘管這是一個分層的圖形，但不能使用Idea Studio進行編輯。它僅在文本模式編輯中使用。

ZBox.en: Although this is a layered graphic, it cannot be edited using the Idea Studio. It is for use within text mode editing only.
ZBox.zh-cn: 尽管这是一个分层的图形，但不能使用Idea Studio进行编辑。它仅在文本模式编辑中使用。
ZBox.zh-tw: 儘管這是一個分層的圖形，但不能使用Idea Studio進行編輯。它僅在文本模式編輯中使用。

ZButton.en: Although this is a layered graphic, it cannot be edited using the Idea Studio. It is for use within text mode editing only. The colors for this graphic are taken from Microsoft Windowsâ¢. This function behaves like a Pick with the pressing of the left mouse button being the button combination to be detected. It will return 1 on the pressing of the left mouse button.
ZButton.zh-cn: 尽管这是一个分层的图形，但不能使用Idea Studio进行编辑。它仅在文本模式编辑中使用。该图形的颜色取自Microsoft Windows¢。此功能的行为就像是选择，左鼠标按钮是要检测到的按钮组合。它将在左鼠标按钮的按下返回1。
ZButton.zh-tw: 儘管這是一個分層的圖形，但不能使用Idea Studio進行編輯。它僅在文本模式編輯中使用。該圖形的顏色取自Microsoft Windows¢。此功能的行為就像是選擇，左鼠標按鈕是要檢測到的按鈕組合。它將在左鼠標按鈕的按下返回1。

ZColorChange.en: Although this is a layered graphic, it cannot be edited using the Idea Studio. It is for use within text mode editing only. A solid pattern should be used if you wish to change the color back to its original color. The order of graphics statements are an important factor in determining which objects will have their color changed. The ZColorChange function affects all objects underneath it, which means, any object whose graphic statement is before the ZColorChange statement (including images that are displayed using a Load statement). Any object whose statement follows the ZColorChange statement will be unaffected. The background color will also be affected by ZColorChange.
ZColorChange.zh-cn: 尽管这是一个分层的图形，但不能使用Idea Studio进行编辑。它仅在文本模式编辑中使用。如果您希望将颜色更改为原始颜色，则应使用实心图案。图形语句的顺序是确定哪些对象会更改其颜色的重要因素。 Zcolorchange函数会影响其下面的所有对象，这意味着，其图形语句在ZColorChange语句之前的任何对象（包括使用加载语句显示的图像）。任何遵循Zcolorchange语句的陈述的对像都不会受到影响。背景颜色也将受Zcolorchange的影响。
ZColorChange.zh-tw: 儘管這是一個分層的圖形，但不能使用Idea Studio進行編輯。它僅在文本模式編輯中使用。如果您希望將顏色更改為原始顏色，則應使用實心圖案。圖形語句的順序是確定哪些對象會更改其顏色的重要因素。 Zcolorchange函數會影響其下面的所有對象，這意味著，其圖形語句在ZColorChange語句之前的任何對象（包括使用加載語句顯示的圖像）。任何遵循Zcolorchange語句的陳述的對像都不會受到影響。背景顏色也將受Zcolorchange的影響。

ZGrid.en: Although this is a layered graphic, it cannot be edited using the Idea Studio. It is for use within text mode editing only.
ZGrid.zh-cn: 尽管这是一个分层的图形，但不能使用Idea Studio进行编辑。它仅在文本模式编辑中使用。
ZGrid.zh-tw: 儘管這是一個分層的圖形，但不能使用Idea Studio進行編輯。它僅在文本模式編輯中使用。

Zip.en: This module is a member of the System Library, and must therefore be prefaced by \System. as shown in the "Format" section. If your application predates version 11.2, use the backslash notation rather than dot: \System\ Work is done in-memory. This function can take either a file or a BuffStream as input. The output is generated in memory and must be written to storage by your code.
Zip.zh-cn: 该模块是系统库的成员，因此必须由\ System进行。如“格式”部分所示。如果您的应用程序早于版本11.2，请使用后斜线符号而不是点：\ System \ Work在内存中完成。此功能可以将文件或BuffStream作为输入。输出是在内存中生成的，必须通过您的代码写入存储。
Zip.zh-tw: 該模塊是系統庫的成員，因此必須由\ System進行。如“格式”部分所示。如果您的應用程序早於版本11.2，請使用後斜線符號而不是點：\ System \ Work在內存中完成。此功能可以將文件或BuffStream作為輸入。輸出是在內存中生成的，必須通過您的代碼寫入存儲。

ZLine.en: Although this is a layered graphic, it cannot be edited using the Idea Studio. It is for use within text mode editing only.
ZLine.zh-cn: 尽管这是一个分层的图形，但不能使用Idea Studio进行编辑。它仅在文本模式编辑中使用。
ZLine.zh-tw: 儘管這是一個分層的圖形，但不能使用Idea Studio進行編輯。它僅在文本模式編輯中使用。

ZPipe.en: Although this is a layered graphic, it cannot be edited using the Idea Studio. It is for use within text mode editing only. The pipe will be drawn with a miter effect, such that pipe segments meet at 45-degree angles.
ZPipe.zh-cn: 尽管这是一个分层的图形，但不能使用Idea Studio进行编辑。它仅在文本模式编辑中使用。该管道将​​​​以斜切效果绘制，使管段以45度角相交。
ZPipe.zh-tw: 儘管這是一個分層的圖形，但不能使用Idea Studio進行編輯。它僅在文本模式編輯中使用。該管道將​​以斜切效果繪製，使管段以45度角相交。

ZText.en: Although this is a layered graphic, it cannot be edited using the Idea Studio. It is for use within text mode editing only. Will not display tab characters.
ZText.zh-cn: 尽管这是一个分层的图形，但不能使用Idea Studio进行编辑。它仅在文本模式编辑中使用。不会显示标签字符。
ZText.zh-tw: 儘管這是一個分層的圖形，但不能使用Idea Studio進行編輯。它僅在文本模式編輯中使用。不會顯示標籤字符。

params.name: Icon
params.description:
Optional. Any image value for the (41 x 41) icon to display in the dialog. Set to "Invalid" to display only text with no icon.
 predefined icons include: \System\Question_icon, \System\Error_icon, and \System\Warning_icon.

params.name: Btn1Label
params.description: Required. Any text expression for the label on the first button.

params.name: Btn2Label
params.description: An optional parameter giving any text expression for the label on the second button. If invalid, the button will be omitted.

params.name: Btn3Label
params.description: An optional parameter giving any text expression for the label on the third button. If invalid, the button will be omitted.

params.name: Btn4Label
params.description: An optional parameter giving any text expression for the label on the fourth button. If invalid, the button will be omitted.

params.name: Text1
params.description: An optional parameter giving any text expression for the first line of text to display.

params.name: Text2
params.description: An optional parameter giving any text expression for the second line of text to display.

params.name: Text3
params.description: A parameter giving any text expression for the third line of text to display. Must be given as Invalid if there is to be no third line.

params.name: Open
params.description: An optional parameter that is any logical expression. If TRUE (non-0) the dialog will be open. If FALSE (0), it will be closed. The default is TRUE. Open will be set to FALSE after the dialog has been acknowledged.

params.name: Modal
params.description: An optional parameter that is any logical expression. If true (non-0), the dialog is modal A modal dialog is always displayed on top of the calling window and prevents further interaction with that window. , if false (0) it is non-modal. This parameter will override the System NoModal flag. If it is omitted, the NoModal flag will prevail. If the NoModal flag is also omitted, the dialog will default to being modal.

params.name: BoldFirst
params.description: An optional parameter that is any logical expression. If true (non-0) the first line of text in the dialog will appear in boldface type. If false (0), it will not be bolded. The default is false.

params.name: Title
params.description: An optional parameter that is any text expression that gives the title to appear in the window's title bar.

params.name: XPosPtr
params.description: Optional pointer to a variable that stores the x-coordinate of the upper left of the dialog, relative to the current monitor. This parameter affects the position when the dialog opens, after which it is used only to return the current position of the dialog as placed by the user.

params.name: YPosPtr
params.description: Optional pointer to a variable that stores the y-coordinate of the upper left of the dialog, relative to the current monitor. This parameter affects the position when the dialog opens, after which it is used only to return the current position of the dialog as placed by the user.

params.name: CloseButton
params.description: An optional parameter that is the index of the button to which the title bar close button should be mapped (from 1 to 4). If CloseBtn is invalid, then the title bar close button is mapped to the first button with the same text as the CancelLabel or CloseLabel application properties. If no buttons match these labels, then "0" is returned when the dialog is closed using the title bar close button.

params.name: DefFocus
params.description: An optional parameter that is the index of the button that should have the focus when the dialog opens (from 1 to 4). If DefFocus is invalid, the first button has the focus when the dialog opens.

params.name: HelpFileName
params.description: An optional parameter that is the name of the help file containing the help topic for this dialog (as identified in the HelpContextID parameter). If HelpFileName or HelpContextID are invalid, then the default is as per the Window function.

params.name: HelpContextID
params.description: An optional parameter that is the numeric context ID identifying the help topic for this dialog (within the help file identified in the HelpFileName parameter). If HelpFileName or HelpContextID are invalid, then the default is as per the Window function.

params.name: Enable
params.description: Required Boolean. Any expression giving the condition that allows the timer to operate. When this parameter is true (i.e. not 0), the timer is "running". When this parameter is false (i.e. 0), the timer stops and the function has a value of false.

params.name: Interval
params.description: Required. Any numeric expression giving the time in seconds between the absolute time periods. This parameter must be strictly greater than 0, otherwise the function value will be invalid.

params.name: Offset
params.description: Required. Offset is any numeric expression giving the time in seconds to shift the absolute time from multiples of the Interval time.

params.name: InputBuffer
params.description: Required. The security context from a client

params.name: UserName
params.description: Required. A variable that will receive the UPNformat username of the user that created the context if the context is successfully validated.

params.name: OutputBuffer
params.description: Required. Any security context response to be returned to a client.

params.name: TagObj
params.description: Required. The tag object that is contributing to the count

params.name: AccumulatorName
params.description: Required. The name of the accumulator that the tag is contributing to. For example, two accumulator names in use by the Alarm Manager are, "AlarmUnacked" and "AlarmActive". If creating your own accumulator, you may use any name you wish.

params.name: Value
params.description: Required. The current value to count for the TagObj\LocalUniqueID. Commonly a 1 or 0.

params.name: LocalUniqueID
params.description: Optional.  If one tag contains items to be accumulated, use this field to provide a locally unique identifier for each. Example:  for accumulation of active alarms in Analog Status tag, this parameter will be "Hi" or "Lo", depending on which built-in alarm is being counted.

params.name: AlarmName
params.description: Required. Unique name for the alarm. Typically the unique ID, which can be obtained using GetAlarmName . If there are multiple built-in alarms in a tag, the convention is to concatenate the UniqueID with a separator and a unique integer or string per alarm. For example, Concat(Root\UniqueID, \AlarmSeparatorString, 0).

params.name: EventTime
params.description: Optional UTC timestamp of the value. Defaults to the current time.

params.name: AccountID
params.description: Optional text. The name of the operator who acknowledged the alarm. If invalid, the  logged-in user (according to the Security Manager) will be used.

params.name: Device
params.description: Optional text. Name of the client device that sent the acknowledgment.

params.name: RecordGUID
params.description: Optional text. Acknowledge only this specific record. See: Alarm API Structure Definitions

params.name: Custom
params.description: Optional. A structure of custom fields to log.

params.name: MachineID
params.description: Optional. The machine ID of the workstation linked with this acknowledgement.

params.name: FromPLC
params.description: Optional. Used only with PLCAlarm tag. True when the Ack took place in the PLC.

params.name: IgnoreSession
params.description: Required Boolean. True to ignore any filtering based on the calling module's session.

params.name: TestButton
params.description: Optional Boolean. Should be valid only when you are calling this function from a test. A value of 0 simulates cancel. 1 simulates OK.

params.name: AlarmName
params.description: Required. The name of the alarm (not the alarm object value that was passed to the Register subroutine) that will be acknowledged

params.name: EventTime
params.description: Optional. Timestamp to use when adding this event to the alarm lists. Defaults to CurrentTime()

params.name: Operator
params.description: Optional text. The name of the operator who acknowledged the alarm. If invalid, the  logged-in user (according to the Security Manager) will be used. If the Security Manger user is empty, then the application property, "LoggedOffLabel" will be used.

params.name: X
params.description: Required. Any numeric expression in the range -1 to +1.

params.name: WritePermission
params.description:
Required. Any BOOLEAN expression. Set TRUE if the owner intends to perform
                                writes or FALSE for read-only access.

params.name: Owner
params.description: Required. The instance of the lock owner.

params.name: SemaphorePtr
params.description: Required. A pointer that will be set TRUE when the semaphore is granted.

params.name: WritingUserID
params.description:
Optional. User ID for the user
                                acquiring the lock. Should be used if the
                                user is going to make working copy changes and not
                                commit them within the lock, so that the
                                correct User ID is assigned to the changes
                                when they are committed.

params.name: AlarmObject
params.description: Required. Object Value for the alarm that was passed to the active Register subroutine.

params.name: EventTime
params.description: Optional,  Timestamp to use when adding this event to the alarm lists. Defaults to CurrentTime()

params.name: Object
params.description: Required. Any object expression to be monitored in the module instance.

params.name: X0, Y0, X1, Y1
params.description: Required These are the numeric coordinates of the client window area in which the COM object is to draw itself.

params.name: ObjectIdentifier
params.description: Required. Specifies a unique identifier for the object that is to be instantiated. It may take one of the following forms: â¢ A text string representing a ProgID (e.g. "Excel.Application"). â¢ A textual GUID in registry format (e.g. "{000208-0000-0000-C000-000000000046}"). Note that the curly braces are compulsory. â¢ A binary GUID (e.g. the result from "GetGUID(1, 00020812-0000-0000-C000-000000000046)").

params.name: EventSearchScope
params.description: Optional. May be any expression that yields a module value or object value. This parameter specifies the scope in which to search for event subroutines. Needed only if you wish to handle events from the COM object. If missing or invalid, the COM events will not be enabled.

params.name: EventParent
params.description: Optional Any expression yielding an object value. If present, specifies the context that is used to resolve scope for event subroutines. May be any expression that yields an object value. Defaults to Self().

params.name: EventCaller
params.description: Optional. Any expression that yields an object value. If present, this specifies an "auxiliary" context for event subroutines. An event subroutine can retrieve this value using Caller(Self()) Defaults to Self().

params.name: LicenseString
params.description: Optional. Used to provide a license key that will be passed to the ActiveX control when instantiated, permitting the use of ActiveX controls that require license data for activation. This will work for both server-instantiated ActiveX controls and those that are remotely called by a VIC.

params.name: NewAccountData
params.description: Required. An AccountData Structure , a single dimension array of AccountData structures or a dictionary of AccountData structures containing the data for the new account(s).

params.name: PtrReturnCode
params.description: Optional. A pointer to a value that will contain one of the defined result codes at the conclusion of the operation. ( Security Manager Return Codes )

params.name: HaveLock
params.description: Optional. A Boolean value that indicates whether the working copy lock is held by the calling code. Default FALSE.

params.name: MachineStore
params.description: Required Boolean. If TRUE (non-zero) attempts to add the certificates to a store in the Local Computer certificate hive. If FALSE (zero) attempts to add the certificate to a store in the Current User certificate hive.

params.name: StoreName
params.description: Required text. The name of the store to add the certificate to. If it does not exist, it will be created.

params.name: CertificateBLOB
params.description: Optional. A buffer holding a DER-binary encoded certificate BLOB (binary large object) of the certificate to add.

params.name: isPFX
params.description: Optional Boolean. TRUE (non-zero) if the certificate is in Personal Information Exchange (PFX) format. FALSE if it is in DER-binary format. Default FALSE.

params.name: PFXPassword
params.description: Optional text. Only required if the certificate is in PFX format and contains a private key. This is the password used to encrypt the private key when the PFX was created.

params.name: FriendlyName
params.description: Optional text. The friendly name to be assigned to the certificate.

params.name: PrivateKey
params.description: Optional. The private key to associate with the certificate. This is only required if you need to associate a private key with the certificate and one is not provided in a PFX format CertificateBlob.

params.name: DSN
params.description: Required. Text identifying the database to connect to. This can be a DSN (data source name) or it could be a connection string containing a fileDSN parameter such as: "filedsn = C:\VTScada\Access.dsn; dbq = c:\testdb1.mdb"

params.name: UserName
params.description: Optional. An optional parameter providing the user name for database access. If both the Username and Password are missing from the function call, a dialog box will prompt the operator to provide values for these parameters.

params.name: Password
params.description: Optional parameter for providing the password, if required, for database access. See note for UserName.

params.name: ConnectTimeout
params.description: Optional numeric parameter specifying the length of time the module will wait for a valid database connection to be made. Defaults to 30 if missing or invalid

params.name: ExecutionTimeout
params.description: Optional parameter specifying in seconds, the length of time the method will wait for a database command to execute. The parameter, UseDriverTimeout must be true for this parameter to have any effect. Defaults to 60.

params.name: IdleTime
params.description: Optional parameter specifying in seconds, the length of time will wait with no database communication before closing the connection. Defaults to 600 if missing or invalid

params.name: CheckBackupTime
params.description: Optional numeric parameter specifying the length of time between checks for cache files left behind failed log attempts. Defaults to 300 if missing or invalid

params.name: DisconnectOnError
params.description: Optional Boolean parameter indicating whether the ODBC connection should be terminated after any execution error occurs. Defaults to FALSE (0) if missing or invalid.

params.name: HandleError
params.description: Optional parameter that can  be any of: â¢ an error handle object, â¢ an array of errors, â¢ a Boolean value. TRUE to disconnect or false to indicate no disconnect. Defaults to false, meaning 'no disconnect'.

params.name: UseDriverTimeout
params.description:
Optional Boolean value which may be set to true if ODBC driver in use supports timeouts. If so, then the execution timeout limit (ExecutionTimeout) is handed to the ODBC functions.

Defaults to FALSE (0) if missing or invalid.

params.name: MirrorToDisk
params.description: Optional Boolean value. If true, this specifies that every write should go to disk. Defaults to FALSE (0) if missing or invalid.

params.name: DBType
params.description: Optional numeric value, indicating the type of this DB connection. Defaults to 0 if missing or invalid. DBType Meaning 0 MS SQL 1 MS Access 2 Oracle 3 MySQL 4 SyBase
PaceRecovery

params.name: PaceRecoveryRate
params.description: Optional. Any numeric expression that will set the time in seconds for recovery of logs. The preceding parameter, PaceRecovery must be set to true. Defaults to 0.1 if missing or invalid.

params.name: RollbackOnConnect
params.description: Optional. Any Boolean expression. If set to TRUE (non-zero) a rollback will be done on connect. Defaults to TRUE (1) if missing or invalid.

params.name: ReconnectDelay
params.description: Optional numeric expression to set the time to wait for reconnect on a failed connect. Defaults to 5 if missing or invalid.

params.name: HandleName
params.description: Required. The name of the handle variable in the container module.

params.name: ArrayName
params.description: Required. The name of the variable in the ContainerObj parameter, that holds an array of values to which the contributor is to be added. The ArrayName parameter may be invalid if there is no such array in the container.

params.name: CountName
params.description: Required. The name of the variable in the ContainerObj parameter, that holds a count of the current number of this type of contributor. CountName may be invalid if no such variable exists in the ContainerObj. Not all contributors need to be counted. Note that CountIncrement determines the initial change in the count and the contributor must maintain the count.

params.name: ContainerObj
params.description: Required. The object value of the container tag module.

params.name: ContributorObj
params.description: Required. The object value of the new contributor to add to the container.

params.name: IndexAddress
params.description: Required. The address pointer of the variable holding the contributor index.

params.name: Value
params.description: Required. May be Invalid. The current numeric value to set in the container's ArrayName array. Value may be Invalid. Value may also be updated at any time by the contributor by scoping into the ArrayName array in the container, and setting the array element at the index that will be set in the variable pointed to by IndexAddress.

params.name: CountIncrement
params.description: Required. The numeric value that will be added to the variable in the container that has the same name as CountName. CountIncrement's value is usually a "1" or a "0", indicating whether the contributor is actively contributing its value. The contributor will increment or decrement the value of the CountName variable as the corresponding state of the contributor changes.

params.name: ContributorType
params.description: Optional string identifier. Using an alarm contributor as an example, this is might be "HH", "H", "LL", "L", etc.

params.name: Editor
params.description: Required. Any expression that evaluates to an editor value that was created by the MakeEditor function. If this is not an editor type value, then the function will do nothing.

params.name: Text
params.description: Required. The text to insert into the text editor.

params.name: TagName
params.description: Required text. The name of the tag being affected.

params.name: NewValue
params.description: Required. The new value of the tag.

params.name: User
params.description: Optional text. The full username of the operator

params.name: Priority
params.description: Obsolete parameter. Use INVALID as a place holder.

params.name: Area
params.description: Optional text. The area property of the tag.

params.name: OperatorNameFlag
params.description: Optional Boolean. If TRUE and no user is specified, the current operator name is logged. Defaults to TRUE.

params.name: Reserved
params.description: Obsolete parameter. Use 1 as a placeholder.

params.name: EvtOldValue
params.description: Optional. The previous value of the tag.

params.name: Units
params.description: Optional text. Units of the new value.

params.name: TagID
params.description: Required text. The unique ID of tag to be locked. (TagObj.UniqueID)

params.name: Level
params.description: Required integer. The Lock Level (defaults to 1).

params.name: Note
params.description: Optional text. A note to log with the lock.

params.name: Custom
params.description: Optional. A structure of custom fields to log. This is anything that can be packed by Pack(). That is, numerics or strings, or any simple data structures that contain numerics or strings such as arrays, structures and dictionaries.

params.name: Timestamp
params.description: Optional timestamp. UTC timestamp of this event.

params.name: SessionID
params.description: Optional text. The ID of the session adding the lock.

params.name: AccountID
params.description: Optional text. The AccountID of the user adding the lock.

params.name: MachineID
params.description: Optional text. The workstation's MachineID, from which the lock was created.

params.name: Device
params.description: Optional text. The name of the client device.

params.name: Parent
params.description: Required  Any expression that returns a module value. Specifies the parent object of the new module.

params.name: Name
params.description: Required. Any text expression providing a name for the new module.

params.name: Reserved
params.description: Reserved for future use. Should be set to 0.

params.name: Attrib
params.description: Required. Any numeric expression giving the module's attribute bits as follows: Attrib Bit No. Attribute 0 - No special attributes 1 0 Reserved - set to 0 2 1 Queued 4 2 Reserved - set to 0 8 3 Reserved - set to 0 16 4 Reserved - set to 0 32 5 Reserved - set to 0 64 6 Reserved - set to 0 128 7 Reserved - set to 0 256 8 Reserved - set to 0 512 9 Protected
Class

params.name: VarTextSize
params.description: Required. Any numeric expression giving the length of the variable declaration for the new module (i.e. NewMod MODULE { a new module }; ).

params.name: DocFileName
params.description: Required. Any text expression giving the file name of the new module's definition document.

params.name: Timestamp
params.description: Required UTC timestamp of the note.

params.name: Operator
params.description: Deprecated text. Only use this when converting legacy notes. The name of the user who entered the note.

params.name: Note
params.description: Required. A text string containing the note or a NoteStruct structure.

params.name: ResultPtr
params.description: Optional. This pointer will be assigned TRUE if the note is added successfully, FALSE if it fails.

params.name: AccountID
params.description: Optional string. The AccountID of the user who entered the note. Defaults to the user who opened the dialog.

params.name: ParentNoteStruct
params.description: Optional structure. If the note is a comment for another note, this must be set to the NoteStruct structure of the other note.

params.name: LegacyConvert
params.description: Optional boolean. Set to TRUE when converting legacy notes. Defaults to FALSE.

params.name: NewStatement
params.description: Required. Any expression that returns a statement value. This is the value of the new script statement to be added.

params.name: Destination
params.description: Required. Any code value expression. Destination is the action that will receive NewStatement.

params.name: Location
params.description: Required. Any numeric expression giving the location of NewStatement within the script.

params.name: TextSize
params.description: Required. Any numeric expression giving the length of NewStatement's text in characters.

params.name: Variable
params.description: Required. Any expression that returns a variable value such as AddVariable(â¦). This variable will become a parameter in the module where it is defined.

params.name: Position
params.description: Required. Any numeric expression giving the position in the parameter list where Variable will be inserted. Position 1 is the first parameter. Inserting a variable past the end of the list will append the variable to the parameter list.

params.name: Address
params.description: Required. Any expression for the address from which to get the data.

params.name: N
params.description: Required. Any expression for the number of elements to retrieve.

params.name: Value
params.description: Required. A pointer to the destination for the read data.

params.name: Rate
params.description: Required. Any numeric expression for the update rate, measured in seconds.

params.name: OriginalAddr
params.description:
For use only by the Driver Multiplexer.  Set Invalid in all other instances. 
The original address string specified in the I/O tag before being parsed into an value that is fit for the Address parameter of AddRead. For example, the original address may be {40001}{42001}, but the address given to the subordinate driver would be 40001.

params.name: DisablePolling
params.description: Primarily for use by the Driver Multiplexer. In general, should be set to Invalid for other drivers.  Any numeric expression, setting a rate value for which Polling will be disabled. Polls will then only be performed by a call to Driver\PollAll() or by setting the Read moduleâs Trigger.

params.name: DeadbandValue
params.description: Optional numeric, applying to analog values only. Sets a minimum amount by which the unscaled values must change before a new value is reported to NewData.

params.name: X1
params.description: Required. Any numeric expression giving the X coordinate on the screen of one side of the object and its label. The smaller of X1 and X2 will always be to the left

params.name: Y1
params.description: Required. Any numeric expression giving the Y coordinate on the screen of either the top or bottom of the object. The smaller of Y1 and Y2 will always be the top.

params.name: X2
params.description: Required. Any numeric expression giving the X coordinate on the screen of the side of the object and its label opposite to X1.

params.name: Y2
params.description: Required. Any numeric expression giving the Y coordinate on the screen of the top or bottom of the object, whichever is the opposite to Y1.

params.name: Var
params.description: Variable to be set by AddressEntry

params.name: IODevice
params.description: Any expression for the name of the I/O device driver being used.

params.name: SupportedData
params.description: A bitwise expression, indicating the data type. (See: Bitwise Parameters & Operations ) Bit Meaning when set 0 Digital 1 Analog 2 Text

params.name: Module
params.description: Required. Any expression that returns a module value.

params.name: Name
params.description: Required. Any text expression giving the name of the new state.

params.name: Reserved
params.description: Reserved for future use. Should be set to 0.

params.name: Size
params.description: Required. Any numeric expression giving the length of the state definition text, measured in characters.

params.name: Statement
params.description: Required. Any expression that returns a statement value. Commonly generated with the Compile function.

params.name: Destination
params.description: Required. Any expression that returns a code value. This indicates where to insert the new statement. If no statement is present in the code value, the new statement will be appended.

params.name: TextSize
params.description: Required. Any numeric expression giving the length of the statement text, measured in characters.

params.name: Module
